text: New York: come on out to what promises to be a great event, sponsored by @project_polis and @Warscapes Magazine. More info here: https://www.facebook.com/events/276438669924816/?ti=ia …
author: michaelkbusch

text: And half were his own staff.
author: michaelkbusch

text: New Yorkers: don’t miss @NavilaRashid, @suchitrav, and @asiannomad discuss politics and possibilities beyond #MeToo, next Friday night in Brooklyn. Sponsored by @project_polis and the @pos_theatre. RSVP here: https://thepolisproject.com/events/anatomy-of-a-movement-beyond-the-metoo-hastag/ …
author: michaelkbusch

text: Check it out, y’all: we have @CabanForQueens lit in Creole!
author: michaelkbusch

text: I love this photo of @AOC and the next Queens DA, @CabanforQueens. It’s refreshing to finally be able to say that the future of New York politics looks bright!
author: michaelkbusch

text: Fun afternoon exercise: compare and contrast post-election-loss @AndrewGillum with post-election-loss @BetoORourke.
author: michaelkbusch

text: Check out this new piece by @bhakti_shringa about #GullyBoy, a new Indian flick, and the muddy boundaries separating influence, theft and artful borrowing between global film industries, for @Openthemag
author: michaelkbusch

text: When I volunteered for @AbdulElSayed this past summer, I was shocked as an out of towner to learn about auto insurance redlining in Detroit, a top issue with nearly every voter I canvassed. Glad to see @RashidaTlaib making moves to do something about it.
author: michaelkbusch

text: Really pleased to see @AkeemBrowderNYC coming out in support of @CabanForQueens, and using his platform to underscore the importance of this DAs race, and the stakes involved.
author: michaelkbusch

text: Shame on the @NYDailyNews for running its poorly reported hit piece on Anthony Alessandrini and Medical Aid for Palestinians. Please contact ryork@nydailynews.com, gotis@nydailynews.com and  lmcshane@nydailynews.com, and insist they retract this trash.
author: michaelkbusch

text: Spending party of my Saturday petitioning for @CabanForQueens. The weather may be cold but the work is good.
author: michaelkbusch
